mt.server

Class MicroServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • mt.server.MicroServer

  • public class MicroServer
extends java.lang.Object
    MicroTraderServer implementation. This class should be responsible to do the business logic of stock transactions between buyers and sellers.

    • Field Summary

      Server communication.

      Orders that we must track in order to notify clients.

      • doTransaction

        private void doTransaction(Order buyOrder,
                           Order sellerOrder)
        Process the transaction between buyer and seller.
        Parameters:
        buyOrder - Order sent by the client with a number of units of a stock and the price per unit he wants to buy
        sellerOrder - Order sent by the client with a number of units of a stock and the price per unit he wants to sell

      • notifyClientsOfChangedOrders

        private void notifyClientsOfChangedOrders()
                                   throws ServerException
        Notifies clients about a changed order.
        Throws:
        ServerException - exception thrown in the method notifyAllClients, in case there's no order

      • notifyAllClients

        private void notifyAllClients(Order order)
                       throws ServerException
        Notifies all clients about a new order.
        Parameters:
        order - refers to a client buy order or a sell order
        Throws:
        ServerException - exception thrown by the server indicating that there is no order

      • removeFulfilledOrders
